name: Half-A-Heart
description:
You wake up in an unfamiliar hospital. How did you get here?  Why are you here? Why are you physically attached to a violent monster? You can't run from it. You share a literal heart with it now. Try to escape and get to the end.

Made By:

T.J. Elmore

Royce Paul

Ian Wallace

Credits:

GameMaker - Software

Sound Effects:           

 Voice Acting done by Dev Team 

 Light buzzing sound Everyday Cinematic Sounds,

 Heart monitor beep - theodore buckett on YouTube

Heart monitor flatline - Just Enough Keys on YouTube

Stretching sound Joe TheSoundEffect Maker

Special thanks to Chillenium GameJam 2023

(Studio Tropic)
